title: Rise of the Tomb Raider Xbox One and Xbox 360 Achievements Revealed - newsR
text: Crystal Dynamics and Microsoft have revealed the full list of achievements included in the Xbox One and Xbox 360 versions of the upcoming Rise of the Tomb Raider action adventure experience. A lot of interesting challenges are included, although some are only possible on the Xbox One. Rise of the Tomb Raider is eagerly awaited by the franchise's millions of fans all around the world, especially since its predecessor, the simply titled Tomb Raider, manage to bring back the s... Â»
